     20       value: |

     22         2. Click on `....`
     23         3. Scroll down to `....`
     24         4. See error.
     25     validations:
     26       required: true
     27   - type: textarea
     28     id: logs
     29     attributes:

     32       render: markdown
     33     validations:
     34       required: false

     36     id: snapchat-version
